about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Injil Sakul, a Frontend Web Developer based in Indonesia. I have a passion for creating digital solutions that are not only functional but also deliver modern, responsive, and exceptional user experiences.
about.paragraph2: Iâ€™m always enthusiastic about learning new technologies and collaborating with teams to solve challenging problems. Outside of coding, I enjoy photography and reading.
